title.value: Оценка среднеспелых сортообразцов тимофеевки луговой укосного и пастбищного использования в конкурсном сортоиспытании
Assessment of mid-season samples of the herd grass of meadow mowing and pasturable use in competitive test of grades

person.name: Kravtsov, S.V., Gomel Regional Agricultural Experimental Station (Belarus)

abstract.value: Modern status of field and meadow grass growing in the Republic of Belarus represents insufficient level of quality and quantity of feeds. The basic weight of grown feeds are presented with cereal grasses of 1-2 species introduced more than 20 years ago and producing low crop yield level. Therefore, development of complementary sorts of perennial cereal grasses, allowing to optimize variety and specie structure of grass stands and to achieve high productivity level appears a serious scientific problem of selection and see d producing of the Republic of Belarus. The article presents the results of evaluation of mid-season samples of the herd grass (Phleum pratense) of mowing and pasturable use in competitive test of grades. Crop yield of the green mass and content of absolute dry matter of the samples of the herd grass (mowing use) is analyzed; amount of dry matter of the grass in pasturable regime of use is evaluated. Comparison of the most important economic indexes and productivity characteristics is carried out and presented.
